member.name: T:OrchardCore.Indexing.ContentFieldIndexHandler`1
member.summary: An implementation of is able to take part in the rendering of a instance.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Indexing.ContentIndexSettings
member.summary: Represents the indexing settings for a content part or a field.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Indexing.ContentIndexSettings.Included
member.summary: Set the content to be added in the index document. Will be indexed based on CLR Type.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Indexing.ContentIndexSettings.Keyword
member.summary: Set the content to be indexed in the index as a keyword (tokenized as a single term). See Lucene StringField.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Indexing.ContentIndexSettings.Stored
member.summary: Set the content to be stored in the index document. The original value will be stored.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Indexing.ContentPartIndexHandler`1
member.summary: An implementation of is able to take part in the rendering of a instance.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Indexing.DocumentIndexOptions
member.summary: Store means that the value will be stored in the index. Keyword means that the value will be indexed and tokenized as a single term. See Lucene StringField. We should use keyword and store options together for technical values. This way it will be using a StringField but also be stored. Stored and Keyword are not the same. If you absolutely need to only store the original value of a field then you should use a Lucene StoredField. See Elasticsearch documentation :

member.summary: An implementation of is able to take part in the rendering of a instance.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Indexing.IContentIndexSettings
member.summary: Represents the indexing settings for a content part or a field.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Indexing.IContentItemIndexHandler
member.summary: An implementation of can provide property values for an index document.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Indexing.IContentPartIndexHandler
member.summary: An implementation of is able to take part in the rendering of a instance.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Indexing.IIndexingTaskManager
member.summary: Provides services to create and retrieve instances. It is used by indexers to track all content items that have to be indexed or re-indexed.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Indexing.IndexingTask.ContentItemId
member.summary: The id of the content item that is represented by the instance.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Indexing.IndexingTask.CreatedUtc
member.summary: The value the task was created.
